predictions.text: The U.S. will impose a new tariff (duty rate increase of at least +10 percentage points) specifically targeting exports to China of at least one additional named AI accelerator model beyond Nvidia H200 (e.g., H100/H20/B200 or a competitor’s accelerator), via a Federal Register notice or USTR/CBP guidance, by 2026-06-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Resolves YES if an official U.S. government publication (Federal Register, USTR release, CBP CSMS, or Commerce/BIS notice) explicitly states a new or increased tariff/duty rate (>=+10pp) applied to exports to China covering at least one AI accelerator model other than Nvidia H200. Resolves NO otherwise by the deadline.
monitoring_signals: Federal Register notices from USTR/Commerce mentioning GPUs/accelerators and China
CBP CSMS messages on new HTS classifications for AI chips
Major wire reports (Reuters/AP) on expanded AI-chip tariffs
predictions.rationale: With a tariff already applied to H200 shipments to China, policy escalation could broaden to other accelerators as enforcement tightens and substitution paths emerge.

predictions.text: Taiwan’s government (or a Taiwan state-linked vehicle) will publish a binding U.S. semiconductor investment commitment (contract/MoU/term sheet) for at least one project with stated value >=$25B (USD) and a named U.S. state/site, by 2026-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Resolves YES if an official release from Taiwan’s government (e.g., MOEA, Executive Yuan) or a Taiwan state-linked investment entity publishes a signed commitment (not a vague intent) for a U.S. semiconductor manufacturing project valued >=$25B and naming the U.S. location/state. Resolves NO otherwise.
monitoring_signals: MOEA/Executive Yuan press releases on U.S. chip investments
U.S. state economic development announcements citing Taiwan-backed funding
SEC filings from involved firms referencing Taiwan government-backed commitments
predictions.rationale: A headline commitment increases odds of at least one concretized, site-specific binding deal within 2026.

predictions.text: NATO will publicly announce and conduct a Greenland-based military exercise in which at least 3 NATO member states participate (as listed in NATO/host announcements), by 2026-09-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Resolves YES if NATO, Denmark, Greenland authorities, or participating militaries publicly announce an exercise conducted in Greenland (on-island or within Greenland territorial waters/airspace) and list at least 3 NATO member participants. Resolves NO otherwise.
monitoring_signals: NATO press releases and exercise calendars
Danish Defence announcements referencing Greenland training
NOTAMs/naval advisories indicating exercise areas near Greenland
predictions.rationale: Rising Arctic tension and prior deployments make a multi-country NATO exercise a plausible near-term signaling move.

predictions.text: Iran will publicly announce a new nationwide policy explicitly criminalizing unauthorized satellite internet access that mentions “Starlink” by name (in law, regulation, or official judiciary/communications ministry directive), by 2026-06-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Resolves YES if an official Iranian source (parliament text, judiciary notice, communications ministry statement, or published regulation) introduces a new nationwide rule with penalties for unauthorized satellite internet and explicitly references “Starlink” by name. Resolves NO otherwise.
monitoring_signals: Iran Majles legislative tracker for satellite internet provisions
Iran Ministry of ICT statements on satellite terminals
Reuters/AP reporting on Starlink seizures and legal changes
predictions.rationale: Extended shutdowns increase reliance on satellite connectivity, raising incentives for Tehran to formalize deterrence with explicit Starlink-focused penalties.

predictions.text: Goldman Sachs will publicly announce a direct involvement in prediction markets—either (a) a partnership enabling client access, (b) an investment/acquisition of a prediction-market operator, or (c) becoming a market maker/liquidity provider on a regulated platform—by 2026-09-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Resolves YES if Goldman Sachs (or a named subsidiary) issues a press release, SEC filing, or on-the-record executive statement confirming (a), (b), or (c) with a named platform/product. Mere exploratory comments do not count. Resolves NO otherwise.
monitoring_signals: Goldman SEC filings for strategic investments/partnerships
CFTC-regulated platform announcements naming GS involvement
Goldman earnings-call remarks shifting from exploration to execution
predictions.rationale: Public exploration plus rising retail participation raises the likelihood of a concrete partnership or liquidity role, though regulatory friction remains high.

predictions.text: The Wikimedia Foundation will publish a budget/annual plan document showing expected revenue from AI/data licensing or “content licensing” of at least $25M (USD) for the coming fiscal year, by 2026-08-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Resolves YES if an official Wikimedia Foundation budget/annual plan (posted on wikimediafoundation.org or linked from official channels) includes a line item for AI/data/content licensing revenue with an explicit dollar figure >=$25M for a future fiscal year. Resolves NO otherwise.
monitoring_signals: Wikimedia Foundation annual plan and budget releases
Announcements of additional paid data-access agreements with AI firms
Foundation financial statements referencing licensing revenue growth
predictions.rationale: If licensing expands, Wikimedia is likely to formalize it as a material budget line item within its next planning cycle.

predictions.text: The U.S. FDA will open a formal public process (docket/RFI/ANPRM/guidance draft) addressing safety assessment of at least one BPA-replacement chemical used in food-contact materials (e.g., BPS, BPF) by 2026-12-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Resolves YES if FDA posts a docket or RFI/ANPRM/draft guidance explicitly focused on at least one BPA alternative (naming the chemical) in food-contact packaging/materials. General endocrine-disruptor discussion without named BPA alternative does not count. Resolves NO otherwise.
monitoring_signals: Regulations.gov searches for FDA dockets mentioning BPS/BPF and food contact
FDA CFSAN announcements on packaging chemicals
Congressional letters/hearings prompting FDA review of BPA alternatives
predictions.rationale: Scientific concerns may pressure FDA toward a formal information-gathering step, but timelines are uncertain and FDA often moves slowly absent acute incidents.

predictions.text: Total acres burned by wildfires in Alaska during calendar year 2026 will exceed 1.5 million acres, according to the Alaska Interagency Coordination Center (AICC) final season statistics or NIFC year-end summary, by 2026-10-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Resolves YES if AICC or NIFC publishes a 2026 Alaska total acres-burned figure >1,500,000 acres. If multiple official sources differ, use AICC final season statistics; otherwise NIFC year-end. Resolves NO if <=1,500,000 or not exceeded by deadline.
monitoring_signals: AICC weekly situation reports and cumulative acreage
NOAA/Alaska drought and lightning outlooks
Early-season fire starts and fuel-moisture indices
predictions.rationale: Research and recent patterns suggest elevated tail risk for extreme burn seasons, though large-year outcomes remain highly weather-dependent.

predictions.text: TSMC will raise the midpoint of its stated 2026 capital expenditure guidance by at least 10% versus the midpoint provided in its Q4 2025 earnings release/call, in a subsequent 2026 earnings release/call by 2026-07-31 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Resolves YES if TSMC’s 2026 capex guidance midpoint (as stated in an earnings release/call transcript) is increased by >=10% relative to the midpoint guidance stated in its Q4 2025 results communication. Resolves NO otherwise.
monitoring_signals: TSMC quarterly earnings transcripts for capex guidance revisions
Foundry capacity tightness indicators and lead-time commentary
AI accelerator order-book/CoWoS capacity expansion updates
predictions.rationale: AI demand and leading-edge capacity constraints raise the probability of upward capex revisions, but management may stick to ranges if macro uncertainty rises.

predictions.text: FHFA will publish an official document initiating a structured public consultation on “ending conservatorship” or privatization/IPO pathways for Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac (e.g., RFI, proposed framework, or equivalent), by 2026-09-30 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Resolves YES if FHFA posts on its website or in the Federal Register a document explicitly soliciting public input or laying out a proposed framework for ending conservatorship or IPO/recap-privatization steps for Fannie/Freddie. General speeches without a consultation document do not count.
monitoring_signals: FHFA Federal Register publications and press releases
Treasury/FHFA joint statements on GSE capital and exit plans
Legislative proposals affecting GSE privatization authority
predictions.rationale: IPO discussions increase the chance FHFA formalizes next steps, but housing affordability politics could delay a public consultation.
